overview:
Peter Ryan, a serial entrepreneur, is driving the strategy and growth plan at iJento and has extensive experience of leading fast growth, venture backed technology companies.

Peter was formerly Chairman and CEO of InnaPhase Corporation, a company he founded in 1997 and subsequently built into the worldâ€™s largest provider of laboratory information management systems. In September 2004, Peter orchestrated the sale of InnaPhase to Thermo Electron Corporation (NYSE:TMO) in one of the largest industry deals in the laboratory technology sector.

Since the sale of his venture backed company in 2004, and prior to joining iJento, Peter divided his time between private technology investments and non-executive board positions. He has also spent many years as an executive within the contract research and pharmaceutical technology industries.
